name: Nyagara Falls
description:
Credits (from less degenerate to more degenerate):
Borderandry (3D) https://borderandry.itch.io/
jstahn (Pixel Art) https://jstahn.itch.io/
Leonard (Coder) https://leonardneitzel.itch.io/
JLagar (2D) https://jlagar.itch.io/

Note: this game is just a prototype, we don't know if we are gonna continue developing it or leave it be

After the apocalypse, most humans were mutated into creatures, the earth itself changed and the perception of the ones that didn't mutate deteriorates. 

You're one of the last humans, living in a world of catgirls, and you are searching for answers:

What is true and what is imaginary?
What is the real nature of man?
Will you succumb to wenches or silence them?

Includes the following features:

  • Bonk Catgirls
  • Intercat with Catgirls
  • Or just yeet from Catgirls
  • And powerful ultimate moves that re-shape the world!

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "World Building"  (SummerSemester 2020/21)
